reviews.content: Crashes consistently no matter what I do

‪Works perfectly in my iPhone XS Max iOS 12.1.1 ‬
‪Chimera 1.3.8‬
‪Sileo 1.4.1‬
‪Sileo beta ( Channel ) 1.5.0b1‬
‪Zebra 1.0~beta22-2 ‬

It is a really good port of the ios 12.2 version. It isn’t compatible with A12 devices yet. Otherwise on other devices it functions as intended. No problems of crashes on iPhone X and below.! A12 devices the about page crashes.
